mapper.insert: insert into leave_record (student_id, student_name, leave_title, leave_reason, leave_status, leave_begin_time, leave_end_time, leave_days, specialty_no, dept_no, clazz_no) values (#{studentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{studentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{leaveTitle}, #{leaveReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{leaveStatus}, #{leaveBeginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{leaveEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{leaveDays,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{specialtyNo,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{deptNo,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{clazzNo,jdbcType=BIGINT})
mapper.update: update leave_record set leave_title = #{leaveTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, leave_reason = #{leaveReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, leave_begin_time = #{leaveBeginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, leave_end_time = #{leaveEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, leave_days = #{leaveDays,jdbcType=INTEGER}, where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, student_id, student_name, leave_reason, leave_begin_time, leave_end_time, leave_days, specialty_no, dept_no, clazz_no from leave_record where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select id,student_id, student_name, leave_title, leave_reason,leave_status, leave_begin_time, leave_end_time, leave_days, specialty_no, dept_no, clazz_no from leave_record

select id,student_id, student_name, leave_title, leave_reason,leave_status, leave_begin_time, leave_end_time, leave_days, specialty_no, dept_no, clazz_no from leave_record where student_id=#{studentId} and ((#{leaveBeginTime} >= leave_begin_time and #{leaveBeginTime} <= leave_end_time) or (#{leaveEndTime} >= leave_begin_time and #{leaveEndTime} <= leave_end_time)) limit 1
